# WebServiceRequestBase.Timeout property

Gets or sets the timeout. If [`GetHttpClient`](../WebServiceRequestSettings/GetHttpClient.md) is set, then this property is ignored.

```csharp
public TimeSpan? Timeout { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

The timeout.
